GSD.description:
udmabuf: Set the DMA mask for the udmabuf device (v2)

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.7 by commit f2f6ea1a8da1317430a84701fc0170449ee88315. For more details please see the references link.
